message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $12,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value is quite high.  Would you consider $13,000?  It's a compromise that reflects the true worth of what I'm offering.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm willing to consider $13,000 if there are any additional benefits or services included with the product. Otherwise, I would still like to stick to my original offer of $12,000.
